马来西亚.text: [14-01-26 · 马来西亚] Committee of Permanent Representatives to ASEAN, Deputy Secretary-General of ASEAN had a working lunch with Secretary of State for International Development of Canada
马来西亚.text_zh: [14-01-26 · 马来西亚] 东盟常驻代表委员会，东盟副秘书长与加拿大国际发展部长举行工作午餐
马来西亚.summary: The Committee of Permanent Representatives to ASEAN (CPR) and Deputy Secretary-General of ASEAN for ASEAN Economic Community today had a working lunch with Secretary of State for International Deve
马来西亚.summary_zh: 东盟常驻代表委员会（CPR）和东盟经济共同体副秘书长今天与国际发展国务卿举行了工作午餐。

马来西亚.text: [14-01-26 · 马来西亚] Secretary-General of ASEAN hosts Working Dinner with Ambassador of Norway to ASEAN
马来西亚.text_zh: [14-01-26 · 马来西亚] 东盟秘书长与挪威驻东盟大使举行工作晚宴
马来西亚.summary: Dr. Kao Kim Hourn, Secretary-General of ASEAN, hosted a working dinner with H.E. Mariann Ruud Hagen, Ambassador of the Kingdom of Norway to ASEAN, during which both sides exchanged views on strengt
马来西亚.summary_zh: 东盟秘书长高金洪博士与挪威王国驻东盟大使玛丽安·鲁德·哈根阁下举行了工作晚宴，双方就加强合作交换了意见。

马来西亚.text: [14-01-26 · 马来西亚] Secretary-General of ASEAN reflects on ASEAN-China dialogue relations with Xinhua News Agency
马来西亚.text_zh: [14-01-26 · 马来西亚] 东盟秘书长在与新华社的对话中反思东盟与中国的关系
马来西亚.summary: Secretary-General of ASEAN, Dr. Kao Kim Hourn, today engaged in an interview with Xinhua News Agency, in Jakarta, to reflect on ASEAN’s development over the past year. The discussion highlighted th
马来西亚.summary_zh: 东盟秘书长高金洪博士今天在雅加达接受了新华社的采访，回顾了东盟过去一年的发展。讨论突出了……

新加坡.text: [14-01-26 · 新加坡] Singapore’s revised 2035 farming goals ‘balance ambition and pragmatism’ amid challenges: Zaqy
新加坡.text_zh: [14-01-26 · 新加坡] 新加坡修订的2035农业目标在挑战中“平衡了雄心与务实”：扎基
新加坡.summary: Local farms will receive more support in reducing production costs and securing resources for their produce.
新加坡.summary_zh: 地方农场将获得更多支持，以降低生产成本并确保其产品的资源。

新加坡.text: [14-01-26 · 新加坡] Local Qualifying Salary for S’porean workers to be refined in upcoming Budget: Tan See Leng
新加坡.text_zh: [14-01-26 · 新加坡] 新加坡工人的本地合格薪资将在即将到来的预算中进行调整：陈仕琼
新加坡.summary: The Local Qualifying Salary was last raised to $1,600 from $1,400 in 2024.
新加坡.summary_zh: 地方合格工资在2024年最后一次从1400美元提高到1600美元。

新加坡.text: [14-01-26 · 新加坡] Committee formed to review salaries of political appointment holders: Chan Chun Sing
新加坡.text_zh: [14-01-26 · 新加坡] 成立委员会审查政治任命持有者的薪资：陈振声
新加坡.summary: Political salaries have not been adjusted since 2012, when the Government accepted a review committee’s recommendations.
新加坡.summary_zh: 自2012年以来，政治薪资未作调整，当时政府接受了审查委员会的建议。

新加坡.text: [14-01-26 · 新加坡] Bill on sharing of citizen data passed in Parliament amid MPs’ call for safeguards, transparency
新加坡.text_zh: [14-01-26 · 新加坡] 关于公民数据共享的法案在国会通过，尽管议员呼吁保障措施和透明度
新加坡.summary: It spells out data sharing requirements with external parties like social service agencies and self-help groups.
新加坡.summary_zh: 这明确了与社会服务机构和自助团体等外部方的数据共享要求。

industry_observations.text: [14-01-26 · 其他] Singapore farmers head across the border to Johor for cheaper land and energy
industry_observations.text_zh: [14-01-26 · 其他] 新加坡农民跨越边界前往柔佛寻找更便宜的土地和能源
industry_observations.summary: An agriculture hub is emerging as part of the Johor-Singapore Special Economic Zone.
industry_observations.summary_zh: 作为柔佛-新加坡特别经济区的一部分，农业中心正在崛起。

industry_observations.text: [14-01-26 · 其他] BNPL provider Atome secures $444m funding from banks including HSBC, DBS to expand in region
industry_observations.text_zh: [14-01-26 · 其他] BNPL提供商Atome获得来自包括汇丰银行和星展银行在内的4.44亿美元融资，以在该地区扩展业务
industry_observations.summary: The credit facility is up from the US$200 million secured in 2024.
industry_observations.summary_zh: 信贷额度从2024年获得的2亿美元上升。

industry_observations.text: [14-01-26 · 科技] SGX said to be proposing bond futures for India, South-east Asia
industry_observations.text_zh: [14-01-26 · 科技] 新加坡交易所据称正在提议为印度和东南亚推出债券期货
industry_observations.summary: It held calls with treasury officials from global banks about introducing the futures, sources said.
industry_observations.summary_zh: 消息人士称，它与全球银行的财政官员进行了电话会议，讨论引入期货的事宜。

industry_observations.text: [14-01-26 · 其他] New titan rises as Malaysia’s Sunway makes $3.5b move on construction bigwig IJM
industry_observations.text_zh: [14-01-26 · 其他] 新巨头崛起，马来西亚的双威以35亿美元收购建筑巨头IJM
industry_observations.summary: The merger is set to create an infrastructure powerhouse with a market value of nearly S$15.8 billion.
industry_observations.summary_zh: 此次合并预计将创造一个市值近158亿新元的基础设施巨头。

industry_observations.text: [14-01-26 · 科技] Budget 2026: SBF, PwC list out 18 recommendations to strengthen Singapore economy
industry_observations.text_zh: [14-01-26 · 科技] 2026年预算：新加坡商业联合会和普华永道列出18项建议以加强新加坡经济
industry_observations.summary: Business group calls for AI boost, carbon cost relief and hub safeguards as global uncertainties mount ahead of Budget 2026.
industry_observations.summary_zh: 商业团体呼吁在2026年预算前，随着全球不确定性加剧，推动人工智能、减轻碳成本和保障中心安全。
